Get monthly summarized pill totals by county

Source: R/summarized.R
buyer_details.Rd

Get monthly summarized pill totals by county

buyer_details(county = "Mingo", state = "WV", key = "WaPo")

Arguments

county

Filter the data to only this county (e.g. 'Mingo')
state

Filter the data to county within this state (e.g. 'WV')
key

Key needed to make query successful

See also

https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2019/investigations/dea-pain-pill-database/#download-resources

Other summarized: combined_buyer_annual(), combined_buyer_monthly(), summarized_county_annual(), summarized_county_monthly(), total_distributors_county(), total_distributors_state(), total_manufacturers_county(), total_manufacturers_state(), total_pharmacies_county(), total_pharmacies_state()

Examples

# \donttest{
library(arcos)

mingo_wv <- buyer_details(county = "Mingo", state="WV", key="WaPo")

head(mingo_wv)

#>   BUYER_DEA_NO   BUYER_BUS_ACT                   BUYER_NAME
